english_definition: the early part of the day
english_example: I got up early this morning.

english_definition: the end part of the day
chinese_collocations: 安静的晚上,和平的晚上
japanese_collocations: 静かな夕方,平和な夕方
english_example: I have dinner with my family in the evening.
chinese_example: 晚上我和家人一起吃饭。
japanese_example: 夕方に家族と一緒に食事をします。
spanish_example: Ceno con mi familia por la tarde.

english_definition: rest with eyes closed and unconscious
japanese_collocations: 深い眠り,安らかな眠り
english_example: I sleep eight hours every night.
chinese_example: 我每天晚上睡八个小时。

english_definition: the first meal of the day
japanese_compound_words: 朝食メニュー,朝食パン
japanese_collocations: しっかりした朝食,軽い朝食
english_example: I eat eggs and bread for breakfast.
japanese_example: 朝食に卵とパンを食べます。
spanish_example: Como huevos y pan para el desayuno.
